import React from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import ImageHelper from './helper/ImageHelper' import './prodView.css' const ProductViewer = (props) => { const obj=useParams() console.log(props) const {name,description,price,stock}=props.location.state return (
brand:{name}

{description}

price:{price}
stocks:{stock}
) } export default ProductViewer
